parameters: Aww, this is cute! You like frogs?
I don't like frogs. I LOVE frogs!
Ooh, frogs are cool. Kinda slimy though.
I wouldn't know. I've never held one. But I want to one
Oh, these are nice. Do you usually keep candles in here?
Yes, of course. You never know when someone will want
to have a fancy dinner with you!
Of course, no one's ever asked me to one. But I keep
these in my office just in case.

Of course, no one's ever asked me to one. But I keep

I've already memorised them all. But it's good to have
them on hand to settle disputes.
Leaving so soon? I thought we were going to talk about
Leaving so soon? I thought we were going to talk about
Leaving so soon? I thought we were going to talk about
Please take a seat. I will be with you in a moment.
Sure, all right. Take your time.
Oh my goodness! You're... are you...
Yes, I can see it now! You are Jack! Jack from the outside
I'm so sorry! If I had realised it was you, I wouldn't
Yes, umm... well the chairs in my office aren't
the most comfortable so perhaps you would prefer to
stand? I'm sorry, we've never met before and I want
you to have a favourable impression of me.
Yes, I am! Although if you prefer to call me something
different, I will, of course, be honoured!
Please, make yourself at home. Don't hesitate to ask me
I have a question. What was with all the colors changing
Well, to serve Wireland to the best of my ability, I have
to be open and approachable. So I change colours
according to how I'm feeling. That way there aren't
Yes, well... anyway, please look around! Consider my
office like a second home and make yourself
Please take a seat. I will be with you in a moment.
Sure, all right. Take your time.
Oh my goodness! You're... are you...
You've given him too much power.
You have to stop this! Stop this NOW!!
Please, I'm begging you. They can't see it. But I can tell.
You've let him in. Undo this while there's still time or there
\c[18]\a[c]YOU REALLY THINK I'D LET YOU GO?
\c[18]\a[c]YOU REALLY THOUGHT YOU COULD FUCK WITH ME AND GET
\c[18]\a[c]AND THERE'S NOTHING YOU CAN DO ABOUT IT.
I can only take you to the menu. From that point on,
you're on your own. Please make the right choice.
Oh hey, umm, please don't mess with that. A lot of it is
Classified? Oooh, does Wireland have secrets? Is there a
big conspiracy? Does it have a crime ring?
Uhh... yes, no, and sort of. It's complicated. But we've
got a lot of superheroes here so any crime that does pop
up is swiftly taken care of.
Something I've been wondering: if everyone's outside
their game here and the Law of Death Permanence
dictates that death is permanent outside of their game,
is Wireland dangerous for game characters?
Wireland doesn't have the necessary coding to execute
death sequences or permanently delete characters. Only
games with deaths built in can do that.
Then again, it also doesn't have the coding to support
regeneration and respawning, so if someone lost all their
health, they would be in a suspended state until returned
Precisely. Or unless they came to me for a boost of
Wait so last time we were here, I traversed a maze full of
treachery and danger all around me and I wouldn't have
died if I'd gone outside of the boundaries?
Deaths in games are complicated. If any character can
die in a game, anyone can die in it. Even if they're not
Ah. That makes more sense. I did go back and watch it
and hoo boy, lots of death in that game.
No kidding. But it takes a lot to die there. I've been there
loads of times and I'm still here.
Ah, are you ready to discuss why you're here?
I'd like to look around some more.
Of course. So, what can I do for you?
Well, Billy seems to think Wireland is in some kind of... of
danger, I guess. Which is why he called me here.
People have been disappearing. Things have been
You did? Then why involve me?
Ah, yes... well, you see, I told Billy here that if things did
get dire, if he thought we needed the extra authority, he
should call you here. And recently, there have been a
Who else would cause these kinds of glitches?
Are you saying Anti is behind this?
Without a doubt. I know things look okay, but trust me
when I say there have been a lot of incidents. The thing
is, he shouldn't be this powerful. I don't know why he's
been able to bypass my safety measures.
You see, when you're not around, I am the most powerful
person here. I contain all your personal information,
settings, and even passwords. But don't worry, I don't
As of late, however, Anti seems to have bypassed some
of my regulations. I'm not sure how he's doing it, but
no one is more powerful than you, Jack. Not even me.
So you're the only one who can stop it.
So that's what you meant by overrides, Billy?
Yeah. I thought you could hop onto the computer or
something. Maybe you could figure out how Anti's
I could give it a look, sure. Though I'm no expert on
You did manage to lock me, and all the other egos, out
of Wireland last time you were here. That was... quite
That's my job. No need to apologise. And it was pretty
Regardless, I'd be more than happy to have you take a
look; however, there is one small issue we'll have to
Figures it wouldn't be this easy.
I'm sorry for the inconvenience, but I recently created a
safety measure that requires everyone to have an ID to
access a computer. I thought I could monitor who was at
what computer at any given time.
It's merely a matter of getting down to Jorji's shop to
purchase some. In fact, allow me to pay for them, as a
sign of good will. I will be more than happy to hold onto
Sure, we can do that. It'd be cool to have authentic
I'm so glad. Thank you for being so understanding.
And Jack, I wish I could have met you under better
Me too. Again, sorry I locked you out as Seán. I didn't
realise it'd have those kinds of consequences.
It did. That's why the games were blending together.
Technically, they're not supposed to do that, but as of
late, they've been doing it because of Anti's interference.
Before, it was me keeping them separated.
But as I said, it's all right; no need to beat yourself up
over this. Besides, the longer we spend here, I'm afraid
the more Anti's influence may be growing.
We'd better get these IDs as soon as possible then.
Oh, and before we part, maybe you should have a way
to contact us, in case you have questions or just want
to talk! My number's programmed in.
Oh yeah. I guess my phone wasn't on me when I came
Call me any time. Day or night. I'm here to help!
Excellent. Anyway, you can get your IDs at at Jorji's. Easy
to find; it has the Papers, Please logo. I'll meet you there!
Well, we might as well go!
I'd like to look around some more.
Of course. I'll be happy to show you anything!
Do you watch a lot of TV?
I wish I had time. But I have to work a lot. I do go down
to the studios all the time, just to break up arguments.
Never a dull moment, so I don't need TV to entertain
And please don't mess with it. It's hung rather
precariously. I don't want it to fall on one of you.
You've got two drinks out. Was someone here?
Ah, no. I just couldn't decide which one I wanted so I got
That just feels like something someone of this status
Ah, it's... actually more just a byproduct of my
Whiskey on the rocks and hot chocolate? Unusual
Yes, I've been told I have odd tastes in drinks.

Yes, I keep it updated as much as I can. That way I can
